ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Primitive Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft primitive esoteric prosthetics, to keep your injured tribesmen on top of their killing game. These are designed to be easy to use and easy to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Medieval Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft medieval-level esoteric prosthetics, to make your own terrifying cyborg knights! These are designed to be easy to use and easy to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Industrial Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft industrial-tier esoteric prosthetics and basic bionics. These are mostly sidegrades to the standard industrial prosthetics, granting specialised tools to those equipped. These require a skilled doctor to attach.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Greyscythe Industrial Prosthetics
subject_story->followed Salazar Grey as he conceptualised a brighter future
subject_story->worked as an engineer in Greyscythe Industries
subject_story->worked as a machinist on one of Greyscythe Industries' urbworld factories
subject_gerund->building Greyscythe patented Industrial Prosthetics

ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Advanced Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft advanced Greyscythe bionics. These are sidegrades and implants designed to augment standard bionics, granting specialised weapons and tools to those equipped. These require a highly skilled doctor to attach, as they often interface directly with a person's biological systems.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Greyscythe Advanced Bionics
subject_story->was an advent follower of the luminary Salazar Grey as he conceptualised a brighter future
subject_story->worked as a lead engineer in Greyscythe Industries, advancing the field of cyborg design and augmentation
subject_story->worked as a lead machinist on one of Greyscythe Industries' glitterworld factories
subject_gerund->building Greyscythe Industries' Advanced Bionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Ultratech Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft the most advanced Greyscythe Industries' superbionics. These are a match for even the most advanced ultratech bionics. These require an extremely skilled doctor to attach, as they often deeply integrated into a person's biological systems.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Greyscythe Ultra
subject_story->was a close friend of Salazar Grey as he built up Greyscythe Industries
subject_story->worked as a research overseer in Greyscythe Industries, one of the pioneers in the fields of Cybergenetics
subject_story->was a lead designer of the Black Star, who hoped to undo the damages done by Salazar Grey.
subject_gerund->building Greyscythe Industries' Ultrabionics

ResearchProjectDef.label: Greyscythe Hypertech Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft Greyscythe Industries' ultimate bionic implants. These were designed to boost their ultratech bionics to the point of even supersceding the designs of the archotechs, who had gone too long unopposed. Only the most skilled doctors can even hope to attach such terrifying implants.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Greyscythe Hyperbionics
subject_story->was a founder of Greyscythe Industries, who sought to overthrow the glitterworld governments as a new corporate overlord
subject_story->worked as a lead researcher in the reality manifold division in Greyscythe Industries, one of the pioneers in the fields of realspace manipulation
subject_story->had their consciousness transfered into a hypertech AI core, preserving the knowlesge accumulated by Greyscythe Industries
subject_gerund->building Greyscythe Industries' Hyperbionics
